Class Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Object Class for representing a matrix

      Constructors

      Matrix(int rows, int cols)  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getEntry​(int rowNumber, int colNumber)
      Gets the value at a specific spot in the matrix
      Matrix invert()
      Returns an inverted version of this Matrix
      Matrix linearComboRows​(double scalar, int firstRow, int secondRow)
      Returns a matrix that has added a scalar multiple of the first row to the second row of this Matrix.
      Matrix plus​(Matrix matrix)
      Returns a Matrix that is the sum of a given Matrix and this Matrix.
      Matrix rowReduce()
      Returns a Matrix that is the row reduction of this Matrix
      Matrix scalarTimesRow​(double scalar, int rowNumber)
      Returns a Matrix that has multiplied a scalar by a row of this Matrix.
      void setEntry​(int rowNumber, int columnNumber, double value)
      Sets the value at a specific spot in this Matrix.
      Matrix switchRows​(int firstRow, int secondRow)
      Returns a Matrix that has switched two rows in this Matrix.
      Matrix times​(Matrix matrix)
      Multiplies this Matrix by a given Matrix - remember that Matrix multiplication is not commutative - and returns the product Matrix.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Converts Matrix to printable string

                     int columnNumber,

        Sets the value at a specific spot in the matrix
        Parameters:
        rowNumber - the row of the targeted spot
        columnNumber - the column of the targeted spot
        value - the new value of the spot in the matrix

      • plus

        Returns a Matrix that is the sum of a given Matrix and this Matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix being added to this Matrix
        Returns:
        sum of the two matrices

      • times

        public Matrix times​(Matrix matrix)
        Multiplies this Matrix by a given Matrix - remember that Matrix multiplication is not commutative - and returns the product Matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix being multiplied by this Matrix
        Returns:
        product of the two matrices

      • scalarTimesRow

        public Matrix scalarTimesRow​(double scalar,
                             int rowNumber)
        Returns a Matrix that has multiplied a scalar by a row of this Matrix.
        Parameters:
        scalar - number by which each entry in the specified row will be multiplied
        rowNumber - row being multiplied by a scalar
        Returns:
        Matrix with the modified row

      • switchRows

        public Matrix switchRows​(int firstRow,
                         int secondRow)
        Returns a Matrix that has switched two rows in this Matrix.
        Parameters:
        firstRow - first row being switched
        secondRow - second row being switched
        Returns:
        Matrix with the switched rows

      • linearComboRows

        public Matrix linearComboRows​(double scalar,
                              int firstRow,
                              int secondRow)
        Returns a matrix that has added a scalar multiple of the first row to the second row of this Matrix.
        Parameters:
        scalar - number by which each entry in the first row will be multiplied
        firstRow - row being multiplied by a scalar and added to the second row
        secondRow - row to which the first row is added
        Returns:
        Matrix with the modified secondRow
